refsection.title: Algorithms
refsection.para: If the fftw module has been loaded into Scilab this function uses that library (http://www.fftw.org/). On the other case the fft function is based on the Fortran routines fft842.f (Cooley-Tukey algorithm for vectors of size n=2^m) and dfftbi.f (for other sizes) .
